projects.name: Expensify
projects.description: An expense management platform enabling users to manage their expenses and update it frequently. Optimized visualization of user expenses and their transaction history using graphs and charts. Key Features: Dynamic Graphic Visualization, Tracking daily expenses.

projects.name: AegisCare
projects.description: An AI/ML based health risk assessment platform. It provides potential health risks for users. Key Features: Trained AI Models, Dynamic Data Handling.

extracurricular: Event Management Head at EDC PICT
